title: 1.8.1 ChopTree[一刀砍樹]插件的問題
author: a0951251
txt_content:
我在原帖下載最新的ChopTree 一刀砍樹插件
可是我安裝後 卻沒有效果
後來我發現有個/CT指令 但他卻說我沒有權現使用
"you have no permission to perform this command"
我已將我的用戶改成ADMIN 管理員
也把自己弄成OP 都還是一樣
我插件裡面的配置文件"ChopTree.properties"
是這樣的# -ChopTree Properties-
# You can add or change the command and toggle command aliases here.
# Because of technical limitations the console commands will always be "ChopTree" and "ct", but the in-game comments will be taken from here.

Command = ChopTree, ct
Toggle = ToggleChop, tc

# Here you can change the options (can also be done in-game).

ActiveByDefault = true
UseAnything = true
MoreDamageToTools = false
InterruptIfToolBreaks = false
SupportMcmmoIfAvailable = true
TreeFellerNeeded = false
LogsMoveDown = false
OnlyTrees = true
EnableOverride = false

# -Material List-
# If the "UseAnything" option is false, the plugin will take the items you can use to chop trees with from here.
# You can either put in the material's name or its ID.

mat = WOOD_AXE
mat = STONE_AXE
mat = IRON_AXE
mat = GOLD_AXE
mat = DIAMOND_AXE

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 你应该有装ES之类的插件或者permissions 里面去调节给自己权利吧

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content: 你需要为自己添加权限-choptree.chop

replies.author: a0951251
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-11-3 03:14 
你应该有装ES之类的插件或者permissions 里面去调节给自己权利吧
我該如何設定呢? 
在用戶組那邊嗎??
可是我的已經改為ADMIN不是最高的嗎?

replies.author: a0951251
replies.txt_content:
rickky2 发表于 2011-11-3 03:35 
你需要为自己添加权限-choptree.chop
請問choptree.chop 這個檔案在哪裡呢??0.0

我這裡只有ChopTree.properties

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
a0951251 发表于 2011-11-3 09:40 
請問choptree.chop 這個檔案在哪裡呢??0.0

我這裡只有ChopTree.properties
这不是档案，是权限

replies.author: a0951251
replies.txt_content:
rickky2 发表于 2011-11-3 03:35 
你需要为自己添加权限-choptree.chop
我搞錯了= =結果只有最高階用戶才有用 
我該怎麼設置玩家用戶也可以使用/CT(開啟砍樹功能)的指令呢?

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
a0951251 发表于 2011-11-4 00:42 
我搞錯了= =結果只有最高階用戶才有用 
我該怎麼設置玩家用戶也可以使用/CT(開啟砍樹功能)的指令呢?
就是为用户组添加权限"choptree.chop"

replies.author: a0951251
replies.txt_content:
